casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rogelio Albino Diaz TOMAS No. 54P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 26, 2019 Anton M. Lebedev, Attorney at Law, for Tomas, Rogelio Albino Diaz. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 11th of February 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of February 2019."
